title: 117. When Is a Negative a Positive?
description: Sure, we all like to hear compliments. But if you're truly looking to get better at something, it's the negative feedback that will get you there.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: Sure, we all like to hear compliments. But if you're truly looking to get better at something, it's the negative feedback that will get you there.
